title: Elegant 1x1 Home w/ Quartz Counters & Whirlpool Appliances!
posting_body: ['1 \xa0bedroom 1 bath 727Sq.Ft.', 'From $3,404/mo', '* Unit 349 - Available', 'Now', 'Hearth', 'CALL US TODAY:', 'show contact info', 'x842', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Move into this superb one-bedroom, one-bathroom residence in the deluxe community of Hearth Apartments!', 'The kitchen has quartz countertops and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, which you can use to whip up home-cooked meals.', 'The trendy interior has vinyl plank flooring.', 'A Moen four-function chrome shower head ensures relaxing baths.', 'With an energy-efficient Nest thermostat, you can maintain indoor comfort year-round!', 'In addition, the open-concept layout allows you to customize the living space according to your preferences.', 'A Whirlpool washer and dryer are provided for extra convenience!', 'Select models have mobile kitchen islands, as well as private decks with storage.', 'As a resident of Hearth Apartments, you have access to a fitness center, a saltwater pool, and a rooftop deck!', 'You can also use the pet spa, the bike storage, and the electric car charging station.', 'Call now and a staff member would love to take you on a next tour of the brand-new building Hearth South!', 'All pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* Location - End/Corner Unit', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Availability24Hours', '* ClubHouse', '* ConferenceRoom', '* Elevator', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* GamingStations', '* Garage', '* Gate', '* GroupExercise', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* MediaRoom', '* NightPatrol', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '*', 'Other', '* PackageReceiving', '* Pool', '* RecRoom', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Spa', '* Sundeck', '* Transportation', '* WirelessInternet', '* MultiUseRoom', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x842', 'Address:', '2870 Kaiser Dr Santa Clara, CA 95051', 'Managed By: Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
